ai-ne26:1.1_0: Herein, what is the mental carcass?
ai-ne26:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood as right thought.”
ai-ne26:2.2_0: “Right thought, right thought, right speech is right action, right livelihood and right effort.
ai-ne26:2.4_0: “As a man, having brought up suffering for rise and fall,” he said,
ai-ne26:2.6_0: “This is incapable of answering, and it cessation.”
ai-ne26:2.8_0: free of defilements, turning away in the breath,
